events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn’t fit me at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request for a recent purchase due to wrong size.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund process for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket doesn't fit. I’m here to assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Thank you for your help. My order number is 54321XYZ. The jacket is unused and I still have the original packaging.
Great! I’ve initiated the return process. You will receive a prepaid shipping label via email shortly to send the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the support and will send it back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I got the refund today. Everything was handled professionally. Thanks again for your help!
The refund case has been closed successfully following customer confirmation of refund receipt and satisfaction.
